_sText:
Counter-Strike: Source : Bot's Navigation Mesh for the map DE_KUNTA_V2


Nav Creator: Meurglis3, Release Date: May 5 2015

Here is the Navigation Mesh for beautiful night'n'haze atmospheric map [de_kunta_v2](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/113280) by Hakk1tus (released June 2010).
It's an almost fully created from scratch and manually optimized (hand-tuned) .nav-file because included in original mapauthor's archive .nav-file was simply auto-gen.

Well... bots use all possible ways now. How transient meetings with them in back alleys! :D

Also this Navigation Mesh is fully Place Painted.

NOTE: For possibility of comparison and in-game testing the original mapauthor's .nav-file included in archive with the [same map](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/113280).

Play and Enjoy! Always will be grateful for your remarks and feedbacks. ;-)

Credits and Gratitudes:
   Hakk1tus (for excellent misty and stelth-friendly map).

Additional Gratitudes:
   BarnDoor (for perfect playable navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),
   Chizbone (for informative and clever article BOT_BRAINED and a set of excellent navigation meshes),
   CoCoNUT (for fine hand-tuned navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),
   Valve Developer Community (for learning articles by Navigation Meshes and Navigation Mesh Commands).

How long the night is - why is this passage so narrow?
How strange my body feels, impaled upon the arrow.

:-)
